definition[0]: to look through the pages of a book, magazine etc without a particular purpose, just looking at the most interesting parts
example[0]: Jon was browsing through the photographs.
definition[1]: to look at the goods in a shop without wanting to buy any particular thing
example[1]: tourists browsing the boutiques and souvenir stalls
example[2]: The trip allows you plenty of time for browsing around the shops.
definition[2]: to search for information on a computer or on the Internet
example[3]: a feature that allows you to browse your hard drive and choose the graphic you want to display
definition[3]: if a goat, deer etc browses, it eats plants
